main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright light in the sky, likely a meteor, on the night of 18 August 1966.
interesting points: The observed object displayed colors of white, blue, orange, and red., Mrs. XXXXX and her husband reported the light illuminating their entire area., The apparition lasted only a few seconds., Several witnesses described the object appearing to fall towards the ground., The conclusion of the report stated the object was likely a meteor.
witness description: Mrs. XXXXX and her husband, others in the area who reported seeing the object.
